shortdef: a person who habitually uses drugs

dt: {bc}associated with, affected by, or suggestive of drugs or drug use

dt.t: They pass around a joint and exchange {wi}druggy{/wi} mumbles. Another night to get bored, get stoned.

Combining the revelry of disco and the disorientation of {d_link|psychedelia|psychedelia}, {d_link|rave|rave:2} music tends to be brazenly {wi}druggy{/wi}, in both its sound and its lyrical allusions.

shortdef: associated with, affected by, or suggestive of drugs or drug use
